system.description:
The most infamous note to have ever been played in all of music history. If someone hears this intense low note they end up emptying their bowels. A target within range of the caster must make a [[/save resolve]]. Targets cannot move or take any actions next turn (aside from loading their pants). Targets gain +3 Sleaze until they have a chance to clean up.

THE STAIN CHAIN: The caster can expend additional Shred Points for each target beyond the first, that is within 5ft of each target.
